short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help customize your chrome new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Sports Robot a new google chrome extension that will allow you to customize you new tab experience on chrome to Sports Robot search which is powered by Bing so you can search whatever sport you want or the one you like the most.


By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the "Sports Robot" tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to Bing provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://sportrobot.info/t-o-s/ and Privacy Policy at https://sportrobot.info/privacy-policy/
